achievements.title: Blink, and You'll Miss It
achievements.desc: It was over before it started, but it managed to tell an enticing tale.

achievements.title: Quickie Addict
achievements.desc: You've been saying "one more" for the past nine hours.

achievements.title: Block by Block
achievements.desc: Just like in a game of tetris, you're building something great out of small pieces.

achievements.title: Short but Gold
achievements.desc: You have learned that some of the greatest things come in small packages.
